content:
As a result of the night massive rocket attack, 5 people were killed, 26 were injured, the National Police reported. Defense forces destroyed 55 shamed and 37 rockets of various types.

In the Liman Tank 60 separate mechanized brigade, the enemy positions were dispersed, 30 brigade with a drone destroys the antironous complex of Russians, and 45 brigade already successfully uses drones with auto -pointing and destroying them with the technique of invaders.

The SBU detained the enemy gun, who wanted to "light up" the Armed Forces tank columns near the front line in Kharkiv region.

These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - junior lieutenant Sergei Lipko and Lieutenant Colonel Sergei Misyura.
title: The night attack of the Russians, the tank closely carries out the position of the enemy, orc biker: Star from the frontier city
description: In the Lyman direction, the tank 60 separate mechanized brigade dispersed the hostile ...
author: Army Inform
